text: niccayamaka maryamutaiya makanakiya masih (isa) tan allah" enru kurukiravarkal unmaiyileye nirakarippavarkal akivitatarkal;. Anal masih kurinar; "israyilin cantatiyinare! Ennutaiya iraivanum, unkalutaiya iraivanumakiya allahvai vanankunkal" enru. Enave evanoruvan allahvukku inai karpippano avanukku allah cuvanapatiyai niccayamaka haramakkivittan, melum avan otunkumitam narakameyakum, akkiramakkararkalukku utavipuripavar evarumillai
